about: My name is Hatice Sarıpınar, and I am a 21-year-old senior student in the Computer Engineering department at Düzce University. Currently residing in Istanbul, I have a strong interest in technology and software development. I am gaining valuable industry experience through a voluntary internship at Tein Yazılım Hizmetleri Ticaret A.Ş., where I am involved in various projects. With a focus on continuous learning and skill improvement, I am committed to furthering my expertise in the field of computer science.
